name: autonomous-v2v-communication-system
description: A V2V communication system using ESP32, GPS, LiDAR, ultrasonic sensors, and NRF modules, integrated with AWS IoT for real-time data exchange. The Node.js backend with MongoDB and Firebase enables live telemetry, WebSockets, MQTT-based messaging, and collision alerts for autonomous navigation.
author: anjalisharma-r <anjalisharmar04@gmail.com>
